The British School of Guangzhou
Dear Parents,
尊敬的家长，
The ‘Saturday English’ team offers you our sincere thanks for all the support that you have given us. We owe the success of our first year to the hard work of our students and the encouragement of our parent community. We wish all our students, who will be taking their exams in June, good luck and success.
“周六英语课程”团队成员衷心感谢您给予我们的支持。第一年课程的成功归功于我们学生的努力以及家长的支持。我们祝愿所有六月份参加考试的学生都取得好成绩。
‘Saturday English’ will continue to run next year on an even bigger scale to encourage our non-native students to carry on improving their English skills, and for our existing students to progress into the next level.
明天的“周六英语课程”的规模将会更大以鼓励我们的英语非母语学生继续提高他们的的英语水平，以及让我们现在的学生进步到下一个级别。
This programme is hosted at The British School of Guangzhou on Saturdays, with each exam preparation course running for the duration of a year, at the end of which students sit for an external exam and gain a certificate from the prestigious University of Cambridge. Thousands of educational organisations, employers, government agencies, immigration authorities and professional bodies throughout the world recognise these exams as proof of language ability. More than 13,500 universities all over the world recognise ‘Cambridge English’ certificates.
课程于周六在广州英国学校举行，每个课程都在一年的时间内辅导学生准备考试，课程结束以后学生会参加外部考核，并获取剑桥大学颁发的证书。全世界上万的教育机构，雇主，政府中介，移民机构和专业机构都认可这些考试作为语言能力的证明。全球超过13，500间大学认可“剑桥英语”证书。
Maximise your child’s success in these internationally recognized Cambridge exams by enrolling them in our ‘Saturday English’ programme. Specially created materials, have been designed by qualified native-speaking teachers who have extensive experience in these exams. Courses complement your child’s existing English language learning programme and make preparing for exams both fun and effective by using challenging and engaging activities.
入读“周六英语课程”可以最大可能保证您孩子在这些国际认可的剑桥考试的成功。我们的教学材料由经验丰富的英语母语老师设计。我们的课程补充您孩子现有的英语课程，我们利用有挑战性和互动的活动为学生考试作准备，但同时课程高效以及充满趣味。
Due to the popularity of our courses and in order to plan our recruitment needs effectively, we are accepting registrations for the next academic year now. Courses for the new academic year will commence on August 30, 2014.
由于课程很受欢迎，以及为了提早安排招聘计划，我们现在就接受明年课程的注册。新一年的课程将于2014年8月30日开始。
We encourage you to register early to avoid disappointment and guarantee a place for your child. These courses are open to all BSG and Non-BSG students. For detailed course information click on the links below, choosing your preferred language.
